design_system.description: A high-contrast, data-dense industrial interface inspired by sci-fi HUDs and tactical control rooms. Prioritizes legibility of critical metrics against deep matte backgrounds.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500 text-black hover:bg-cyan-400 font-medium rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(6,182,212,0.3)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-100 hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-zinc-700 rounded-sm

inputs.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border-zinc-800 focus:border-cyan-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500/20 rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

badges.success: bg-emerald-950/30 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-900/50 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm
badges.warning: bg-yellow-950/30 text-yellow-400 border border-yellow-900/50 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm
badges.error: bg-red-950/30 text-red-400 border border-red-900/50 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm
badges.neutral: bg-zinc-800/50 text-zinc-400 border border-zinc-700/50 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'dark mode only' strategy. Force the 'dark' class on the html element.
Use 'Chivo' for all headings to give a technical, industrial feel. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all data points, sensor readings, and logs.
For the 'Equipment Health Dashboard', use a Bento Grid layout. The Health Score Gauge should be the dominant visual.
For 'Sensor Time-Series', use Recharts with custom tooltips that mimic a HUD overlay (semi-transparent black bg, cyan borders).
For 'Graph Visualization', use a force-directed graph to show sensor dependencies. Nodes should be colored by their health status (Green/Yellow/Red).
Ensure all cards have a subtle 1px border (zinc-800) and a very faint glow on hover.
Do not use standard scrollbars. Customize them to be thin and dark (zinc-800 track, zinc-600 thumb).
Use the provided image URLs for the 'Machine Selector' thumbnails and 'Maintenance Log' headers.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements for testing.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry to create tension and interest.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays and sticky headers.
Do NOT apply universal transitions (e.g., 'transition: all'). Animate specific properties.
Never use AI assistant emojis. Use Lucide icons.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
